TopicTitle: Is the Northern Tylo anomaly still there?

Articles.Content:
I've had Bill Kerman wandering around for hours looking for this thing. Is the anomaly still there? ScanSat v6 gives me a mark, but it doesn't help that ScanSat and Kethane seem to give me different coordinates than KSP from Map view (of Bill's location).

Edited July 10, 2014 by Soda Popinski

I'm not sure which of the two that is, and I'm not sure if I'm allowed to say for fear of spoilers (and I can't remember the rules on that )

One of the two anomalies has been removed, I know that for sure.
This is the closest we have to a definitive record -> forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-0-23-%28Done%21%29-Pic-Heavy/page9. Ask there or report it missing :-)
You can also use ScanSAT and check yourself. And yes i recently did a scan of Tylo in .23.5 and found an anomaly in the northern region of Tylo.
